title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the Dvmdostem Model
text: can install development version PEcAn.dvmdostem r-universe like : can install directly GitHub remotes package like :
code: # Enable repository from pecanproject options(repos = c(   pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install PEcAn.dvmdostem in R install.packages('PEcAn.dvmdostem') library(remotes) install_github('pecanproject/pecan',  subdir = "models/dvmdostem")

title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the Dvmdostem Model

title: Adjust runmask for dvmdostem. — adjust.runmask.dvmdostem
text: Adjust runmask dvmdostem. necessary using mutisite dvmdostem dataset (one grid cell/pixel) forcing community (cmt vegetation) type. words using vegetation map determine pixel's cmt type. case must make sure site PFTs selected, underlying veg map classifies site community type PFT chosen run.

title: Adjust runmask for dvmdostem. — adjust.runmask.dvmdostem
Adjust runmask for dvmdostem. — adjust.runmask.dvmdostem
text: siteDataPath path expected/default runmask (one dvmdostem standard input files) rundir path location run (local run directory) pixel_X X coordinate pixel turn (1 based!) pixel_Y Y coordinate pixel turn (1 based!)

what: Make sure that selected run mask pixel, veg map pixel value and CMT type are all copasetic. The function calls stop() if there is anything inconsistent, for example more tha one pixel is enabled in the run mask, or the enabled pixel's vegetation type does not match the vegetation/community type of the chosen PFTs. — enforce.runmask.cmt.vegmap.harmony
title: Make sure that selected run mask pixel, veg map pixel value and CMT type are all copasetic. The function calls stop() if there is anything inconsistent, for example more tha one pixel is enabled in the run mask, or the enabled pixel's vegetation type does not match the vegetation/community type of the chosen PFTs. — enforce.runmask.cmt.vegmap.harmony
text: Make sure selected run mask pixel, veg map pixel value CMT type copasetic. function calls stop() anything inconsistent, example tha one pixel enabled run mask, enabled pixel's vegetation type match vegetation/community type chosen PFTs.

title: Make sure that selected run mask pixel, veg map pixel value and CMT type are all copasetic. Make sure that selected run mask pixel, veg map pixel value and CMT type are all copasetic. The function calls stop() if there is anything inconsistent, for example more tha one pixel is enabled in the run mask, or the enabled pixel's vegetation type does not match the vegetation/community type of the chosen PFTs. — enforce.runmask.cmt.vegmap.harmony
text: siteDataPath path folder expect find dvmdostem input data files. rundir path local running directory customized files (config, parameters, runmask etc) copied . cmtnum community type (vegetation type) used run. Based chosen PFT, required look correct parameters parameter files.

title: Make sure that selected run mask pixel, veg map pixel value and CMT type are all copasetic. what: Setup outputs to be generated by dvmdostem and analyzed by PEcAn. — setup.outputs.dvmdostem
title: Setup outputs to be generated by dvmdostem and analyzed by PEcAn. — setup.outputs.dvmdostem
text: Setup output variables dvmdostem generate PEcAn analyze. function handles interplay output variables output spec file. custom tags <model> section pecan xml file dvmdostem allow user specifiy list variables generate process, custom path output spec file. need custom path output spec file mostly gone addition variable list, left place case future need . function looks client supplied settings output spec path variable list returns path final run specific output spec file list variables process. run specific output spec file copied place adjusted using dvmdostem script working output spec files.

title: Setup outputs to be generated by dvmdostem and analyzed by PEcAn. — setup.outputs.dvmdostem
code: setup.outputs.dvmdostem(   dvmdostem_calibration,   pecan_requested_outputs,   dvmdostem_output_spec,   run_directory,   run_id,   appbinary_path )

title: Setup outputs to be generated by dvmdostem and analyzed by PEcAn. — setup.outputs.dvmdostem
text: dvmdostem_calibration string 'yes' 'YES' pecan_requested_outputs space separated string variables process NULL. dvmdostem_output_spec path custom output spec file NULL. run_directory path direcotory containing PEcAn run. run_id identifier individual run (usually 10 digit number). appbinary_path path dvmdostem application.

title: Setup outputs to be generated by dvmdostem and analyzed by PEcAn. — setup.outputs.dvmdostem
text: Vector containing path run specific output spec file final   space separated string variables pecanify.

what: Write data into PEcAn shaped output file. — write.data2pecan.file

text: Write data PEcAn shaped output file.

title: Write data into PEcAn shaped output file. — write.data2pecan.file
code: write.data2pecan.file(   y_starts,   outdir,   pecan_requested_vars,   monthly_dvmdostem_outputs,   yearly_dvmdostem_outputs,   px_Y,   px_X )

title: Write data into PEcAn shaped output file. — write.data2pecan.file
text: y_starts list years, .e.: 1901, 1902, 1903, etc. outdir path location look dvmdostem outputs write PEcAn outputs. pecan_requested_vars comma separated string listing variables process (PEcAn names). monthly_dvmdostem_outputs list files available dvmdostem monthly resolution. yearly_dvmdostem_outputs list files available dvmdostem yearly resolution. px_Y pixel offset, Y (latitude) dimension. px_X pixel offset, X (longitude) dimension.

title: Write data into PEcAn shaped output file. — write.data2pecan.file
text: Tobey Carman

title: PEcAn.dvmdostem 1.7.5
text: model2netcdf.dvmdostem longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.dvmdostem 1.7.4
text: PEcAn.dvmdostem now distributed BSD three-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license.

title: PEcAn.dvmdostem 1.7.4
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Prior point changes tracked main CHANGELOG PEcAn repository.
